title: APM (Application Performance Management)
subtext: Monitors and manages software application performance
author: Buzzpy

description.title: APM (Application Performance Management)
texts: Application Performance Management (APM) is a discipline within systems management that focuses on monitoring and managing the performance and availability of software applications.
APM tools help ensure that applications meet performance expectations, providing visibility into the health and performance of applications in real-time.
By using APM, organizations can quickly identify and resolve issues before they impact end-users, thus maintaining a high level of service.
